io.amcp.core

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.core.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Event
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents an event in the AMCP system following CloudEvents 1.0 specification. Events are the primary means of communication between agents. AMCP v1.5 enhances events with: - CloudEvents 1.0 compliance for standardized event format - Extended metadata support with type-safe accessors - Standardized error handling and validation - Multi-language serialization compatibility - Tracing and correlation support for distributed debugging - Reply pattern support for request-response workflows CloudEvents Compliance: - messageId maps to CloudEvents 'id' - topic maps to CloudEvents 'type' - timestamp maps to CloudEvents 'time' - sender maps to CloudEvents 'source' - payload maps to CloudEvents 'data' - Additional AMCP-specific extensions in metadata
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0
    Version:
    1.5.0 - Enhanced with CloudEvents compliance and v1.5 features
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
